::Decadel(a.ka. Waterworm)::

Waterworm: Alright, I'll show you around.  And by the way, you're on the
friend list.  Sorry if you don't trust me....I have
some.....History.......Now, come this way, I'll take you to the training
room first...

Waterworm/Decadel walked off towards the training room, motioning for
AzureBlade and Hugar to follow.
